alert.note: Alert for Allen; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Adams, northeastern Jay, central Van Wert and southwestern Allen Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Recovery, or 8 miles northeast of Portland, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spencerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for northeastern and east central Indiana...and west central Ohio.
